parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From a primary komeo; properly, to provide for, i.e. to carry off.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) an end, (b) event or issue, (c) the principal end, aim, purpose, (d) a tax.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
